name: Pecti-Cap™ JR Calf Capsules
description: Pecti-Cap™ JR Calf Capsules are nutritional capsules for calves and small ruminants under 500 pounds body weight. Pecti-Cap™ Jr Calf Capsules feature electrolytes and vitamins, and provide nutritional support for periods of diarrhea or digestive upset. Always verify with your organic certifying agency to ensure that selected products may be used in your organic operation. Pecti-Cap™ Cattle Capsules contain, fiber (pectins) to help normalize intestinal consistency, electrolytes (sodium, potassium, chloride and bicarbonate) that improve water retention and maintain proper body fluid levels, vitamins and trace minerals. Consider for organic use.
